#summary Instructions to setup Growl for Mac or Windows to show notifications using the Multiplatform desktop app

= Introduction =

Make sure you have the latest version of Android Notifier for Desktop (AND) installed. It's recommended to have the latest version of Growl too.

= Windows =

 # Stop AND if it's running
 # Right-click [http://www.growlforwindows.com/ Growl for Windows] tray icon and select _Open Growl_
 # Select _Security_ tab
 # Keep _Require password for LAN apps_ deselected
 # Select _Allow network notifications_
 # Start AND
 # Right-click AND tray icon and select _Preferences..._
 # Select _Growl Notification Transport Protocol_
 # "Android Notifier" should appear in the "Applications" tab of Growl after 5-10 seconds

= Mac OSX =

 # Stop AND if it's running
 # Right-click [http://growl.info/ Growl for Mac] tray icon and select _Open Growl Preferences..._
 # Go to _Network_ tab
 # Select _Listen for incoming notifications_
 # Select _Allow remote application registration_
 # Do NOT set a _server password_
 # Go to _General_ tab
 # Click _Stop Growl_ then _Start Growl_
 # Start AND
 # Right-click AND tray icon and select _Preferences..._
 # Select _Growl Notification Transport Protocol_
 # "Android Notifier" should appear in the _Applications_ tab of Growl after 5-10 seconds
